Title: MiniTwitter
Description: MiniTwitter is a free Twitter client for .NET Framework 4.5 installed PC. It's developed in C#
HomeWiki:
MiniTwitter

MiniTwitter is a free Twitter client for .NET Framework 4.5 installed PC. It's developed in C#

News

MiniTwitter 1.10.0 released. required .NET Framework 4.6

Features

  • User Streams
  • Lists
  • Search Timeline
  • OAuth

Documentation

  • Context Menu
  • Customize Keyboard Shortcuts
  • Add New Timeline
  • Auto Complete
